# R for Data Science Book Club
.pull-left[

* Small group

# Starting a Book Club

* There is a lot of interest
* If you are interested in starting one I can help you
* What you need to do:
    * pick a book
    * find a location
    * coordinate with me to manage it on Meetup.com
